data.message: Please can someone contact us, we are having issues with a page merge and have not had an answer from Facebook, apart from someone telling us to consult the Facebook Community and online help. Can a real person please get in touch with us so we can resolve this :)

replies.message: Facebook are we going to see a reply to this?
Hey there. Have you tried using these tips to merge two Pages? Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1UfEymX. Thanks. -Jordan

Facebook yes we have. Both pages are the same name and the option to merge them is available. The problem is I want to merge them and keep the page with less likes. 

The reasons for this are because the page with less likes has the correct name, url and we have already advertised a bunch of posts on it. 

Can you help me please! :)

Sending the above comment from our page too. 

"Facebook yes we have. Both pages are the same name and the option to merge them is available. The problem is I want to merge them and keep the page with less likes. 

The reasons for this are because the page with less likes has the correct name, url and we have already advertised a bunch of posts on it. 

Can you help me please! "
Still no response, come on Facebook
